page.title: 02 MY VILLAGE
page.content: { { Port Sunlight}was built for the people who worked at{Lever Brothers.} {My dad}works at Lever Brothers. He has worked there for 13 years. Port Sunlight was built on a tributary of the{River Mersey.} There is still some of the river there, it flows in a little pier at{Lever Brothers. }The water is polluted with soap powder and washing-up liquid waste. Our house was used as a{ticket house}in{1890}and it is still standing today. We have been living in this house for 12 years. We are situated opposite the railway. The{managers}of the{railway}worked and slept there, but now it is used for families but you can still see where the people used to queue for tickets.
